Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Everything I just explained can be used
with the <BLUE>A Button</BLUE>. You'll need them all
for everyday life, so give them a try.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm happy that you are happy!
<PAGE>
Now you're going to be living on this
farm, I'll get the bare minimum that
you'll need ready for tomorrow morning.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Then we just need to give some thought
to how to revitalize the town...

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Anyway, you only arrived today! So I'm
sure you've got more than enough to do.
<PAGE>
I'll talk with the others and town and
come up with a plan with their help.
Then I'll come and let you know.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's time to revitalize the entire town.
We're going to be busy from tomorrow!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Finally, let me give you a few gifts.
Here's a <RED>diary</RED> and an <RED>encyclopedia</RED>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
The diary can be used to <RED>record what</RED>
<RED>you do every day</RED>.
<PAGE>
Keeping a diary will allow you to easily
remember later what you did each day, so
be sure to keep it updated!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
The encyclopedia allows you to check
<RED>information on items</RED> and <RED>play records</RED>.
Take a look at it every now and then.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Your diary is on the <BLUE>X Button</BLUE> <RED>menu</RED>, and
the encyclopedia can be selected from
the <BLUE>bookshelf</BLUE>. Use them effectively!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You must be exhausted from moving in
today, anyway, <MYNAME>. I think that's
enough for now.
<PAGE>
I'll show you around town tomorrow, and
I can introduce you formally to Emma and
Hana then too.
I'm worn out. Time for bed...

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
These are the blueprints for the
furniture that I've give you today.
Hold onto it, just in case.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's it for today. Rest up and be
ready for tomorrow, <MYNAME>.
